verses.verse: The king <S%H4428><s%> shall joy <S%H8055><s%> in your strength <S%H5797><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and in your salvation <S%H3444><s%> how greatly <S%H3966><s%> shall he rejoice <S%H1523><s%>!
You have given <S%H5414><s%> him his heart <S%H3820><s%>'s desire <S%H8378><s%>, and have not withheld <S%H4513><s%> the request <S%H782><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
For you meet <S%H6923><s%> him with the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of goodness <S%H2896><s%>: you set <S%H7896><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of pure gold <S%H6337><s%> on his head <S%H7218><s%>.
He asked <S%H7592><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> of you <S%H5414><s%>, and you gave it him <S%H753><s%>, even length of days <S%H3117><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
His glory <S%H3519><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in your salvation <S%H3444><s%>: honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> have you laid upon him <S%H7737><s%>.
For you have made <S%H7896><s%> him most blessed <S%H1293><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: you have made <S%H2302><s%> him exceedingly glad <S%H8057><s%> with your favor <S%H6440><s%>.
For the king <S%H4428><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and through the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of the most High <S%H5945><s%> he shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
Your hand <S%H3027><s%> shall find out <S%H4672><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%>: your right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall find out <S%H4672><s%> those that hate you <S%H8130><s%>.

You shall make <S%H7896><s%> them as a fiery <S%H784><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your anger <S%H6440><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, and the fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour them <S%H398><s%>.
Their fruit <S%H6529><s%> shall you destroy <S%H6><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, and their seed <S%H2233><s%> from among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
For they intended <S%H5186><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against you <S%H2803><s%>: they imagined a mischievous device <S%H4209><s%>, which they are not able to perform <S%H3201><s%>.
Therefore shall you make <S%H7896><s%> them turn their back <S%H7926><s%>, when you shall make ready <S%H3559><s%> your arrows upon your strings <S%H4340><s%> against the face of them <S%H6440><s%>.
Be you exalted <S%H7311><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in your own strength <S%H5797><s%>: so will we sing <S%H7891><s%> and praise <S%H2167><s%> your power <S%H1369><s%>.
